# The `WebAssemblyRegNumbering.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file implements a pass which assigns <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly">WebAssembly</a> register numbers for CodeGen virtual registers. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file implements a pass which assigns <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly">WebAssembly</a> register numbers for CodeGen virtual registers.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Then assign regular WebAssembly registers for all remaining used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// virtual registers. TODO: Consider sorting the registers by frequency of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use, to maximize usage of small immediate fields.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumVRegs = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a810234b6b3d223b7c74a4253fcc5ea5e">getRegInfo</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo/#ae73582bbbc71758dcac70cd8c56210e4">getNumVirtRegs</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumStackRegs = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start the numbering for locals after the arg regs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurReg = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyfunctioninfo/#af05f6370f2508ffc40a3600dfb6e2341">getParams</a>().size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VRegIdx = 0; VRegIdx &lt; NumVRegs; ++VRegIdx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> VReg = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#a1979c563289f871907832e419889f979">Register::index2VirtReg</a>(VRegIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip unused registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.use&#95;empty(VReg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle stackified registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyfunctioninfo/#a06bf1d7d3fad0e5185a4ff892c7ad4a5">isVRegStackified</a>(VReg)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;VReg &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af085ea923a328b9fa6a1975f1a4ff987">printReg</a>(VReg) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; -&gt; WAReg &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; (INT32&#95;MIN | NumStackRegs) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyfunctioninfo/#a6c521472c6da6834fae5613839fc5ef9">setWAReg</a>(VReg, INT32&#95;MIN | NumStackRegs++);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyfunctioninfo/#a3277254e3876da271eac5f78dd9cab50">getWAReg</a>(VReg) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly/#a77bfe2fcd74307eb34fab682645aea2a">WebAssembly::UnusedReg</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;VReg &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af085ea923a328b9fa6a1975f1a4ff987">printReg</a>(VReg) &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; -&gt; WAReg &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; CurReg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/webassemblyfunctioninfo/#a6c521472c6da6834fae5613839fc5ef9">setWAReg</a>(VReg, CurReg++);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
